title: Week 1
description: Use Notepad to create an HTML file that contains your name and student id.

title: Week 3
description: Create a form that contains: (at least) -Textbox -Radio button -Select -Checkbox -Text area -Make sure to decorate your form using CSS, Bootstrap, or whatever you like to use

title: Week 4
description: Write a webpage that receives a number from window.prompt() - Then display Multiple Table in the form of table using Javascipt ( document.write()) - Deploy your work to Firebase Hosting. (using firebase deploy) Submit your source code and Link to your Firebase project to Google classroom.

title: Week 5
description: Validate Form: (You can use form from previous homework or edit the old one.) Use javascript to validate a form: -Textbox -Radio button -Select -Checkbox  (if you have multiple checkboxes, you can specify the minimum number of items to be selected.)

title: Week 7
description: Bangkok parallax website my midterm project
